values.value: Type 1 MEWP: MEWP for which travelling is allowed only when in the stowed position. Type 2 MEWP: MEWP for which travelling with the work platform in the elevated travel position is controlled from a point on the chassis. Type 3 MEWP: MEWP for which travelling with the work platform in the elevated travel position is controlled from a point on the work platform. Note: Type 2 and type 3 MEWPs can be combined. ANSI A92.24
Is the operator certified on the specific type & group being operated?
